collectionProcessors.name: sourceProduct
collectionProcessors.label: Get sources from product

Flow.description: Flow to allow planners to set up external transfers
Flow.label: Recommendation | set up external transfers

fields.name: DoneText
fields.fieldText:
This recommendation will be created once you've finished this flow.

You can either create another External transfer recommendation, go to this one, or click 'Finish'.

If you click Finish, you'll be taken to the screen that allow you to select the next recommendation type you'd like to create.

fields.name: productDisplayRec
fields.fieldText:
Please provide the transfer details for this product:


Name: {!destinationRecommendationSelect.firstSelectedRow.DestinationName__c}.

fields.name: fullAmountRec
fields.fieldText:
Amount

The expected value will be the full value of the source account as shown above.

fields.name: Transfer_notesRec
fields.helpText: Please list any details pertaining to the transfer method, eg which stock lines should be in-specie etc

value.stringValue: Will the fulfilment have a non standard deadline?
Is there an action that ha sto happen before this transfer can go ahead?

fields.name: productDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Please provide the transfer details for this product:


Name: {!productsToHaveTransferSelection.firstSelectedRow.Name}

Value: {!productsToHaveTransferSelection.firstSelectedRow.FP_Value__c}

fields.name: fullAmount
fields.fieldText:
Amount

The expected value will be the full value of the source account as shown above.

fields.name: TransferNotes
fields.helpText: Please list any details pertaining to the transfer method, eg which stock lines should be in-specie etc

value.stringValue: Will the fulfilment have a non standard deadline?

fields.name: destinationExplanation
fields.fieldText:
Transfer in

Please select the product in the table below which you would like to recommend an external transfer into.

fields.name: uncrystallisednote
fields.fieldText: NOTE: Please ensure you only select UNCRYSTALLISED pensions for transfers into and out of. If either the destination or source for this transfer has been crystallised, please use the old process.

value.stringValue: Has the product been accepted already?
